```
    _ childViewController: NSSplitViewItemAccessoryViewController,

```

## [See Also](/documentation/AppKit/NSSplitViewItem/insertTopAlignedAccessoryViewController(_:at:)#see-also)

### [Configuring accessory views](/documentation/AppKit/NSSplitViewItem/insertTopAlignedAccessoryViewController(_:at:)#Configuring-accessory-views)

[`var topAlignedAccessoryViewControllers: [NSSplitViewItemAccessoryViewController]`](/documentation/appkit/nssplitviewitem/topalignedaccessoryviewcontrollers)The following methods allow you to add accessory views to the top/bottom of this splitViewItem. See `NSSplitViewItemAccessoryViewController` for more details.[`var bottomAlignedAccessoryViewControllers: [NSSplitViewItemAccessoryViewController]`](/documentation/appkit/nssplitviewitem/bottomalignedaccessoryviewcontrollers)[`func addTopAlignedAccessoryViewController(NSSplitViewItemAccessoryViewController)`](/documentation/appkit/nssplitviewitem/addtopalignedaccessoryviewcontroller(_:))[`func removeTopAlignedAccessoryViewController(at: Int)`](/documentation/appkit/nssplitviewitem/removetopalignedaccessoryviewcontroller(at:))NOTE: you can use this method, or `-removeFromParentViewController:`, whichever is easier.[`func addBottomAlignedAccessoryViewController(NSSplitViewItemAccessoryViewController)`](/documentation/appkit/nssplitviewitem/addbottomalignedaccessoryviewcontroller(_:))[`func insertBottomAlignedAccessoryViewController(NSSplitViewItemAccessoryViewController, at: Int)`](/documentation/appkit/nssplitviewitem/insertbottomalignedaccessoryviewcontroller(_:at:))[`func removeBottomAlignedAccessoryViewController(at: Int)`](/documentation/appkit/nssplitviewitem/removebottomalignedaccessoryviewcontroller(at:))NOTE: you can use this method, or `-removeFromParentViewController:`, whichever is easier.[`class NSSplitViewItemAccessoryViewController`](/documentation/appkit/nssplitviewitemaccessoryviewcontroller)
